revised_title: Development and Function of the Heart and Pericardium in Echinodermata
tldr: The author investigates the development and function of the heart and pericardium in echinoderms, discovering that the pericardial vesicle transforms into a heart-like structure during the larval stage. This structure pulsates and plays a crucial role in the development of echinoderms, such as sea urchins and starfish.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
